title: Best of The Herd for Aug 03, 2020

description:
Are the Rockets a threat to win a title in the bubble?

Why the Lakers can't win the championship

Where Colin was right, where Colin was wrong

How Matt LaFluer should answer questions about Aaron Rodgers


Guests: Chris Bosh, 2x NBA Champion

Brett Veach, Chiefs GM
